markdownRemark.html:
The JaxFusion user group is meeting tonight at 6:30 PM at Vurv Technology in Jacksonville.

I will be giving a presentation on XML features in ColdFusion MX as well as the StAX Java API. StAX allows ColdFusion and Java to process very large XML files.

frontmatter.title: JaxFusion meeting tonight at Vurv on XML
